title: [1508521049] How To Make Garlic & Saffron Mayonnaise - Gordon Ramsay
description:
A simple recipe with just a scent and tinge of saffron. Leave the saffron out if you don't have - but it imparts incredible flavour. 

If you liked this clip check out the rest of Gordon's Channels 

http://www.youtube.com/gordonramsay
http://www.youtube.com/kitchennightmares
http://www.youtube.com/thefword


Follow Gordon on Twitter @GordonRamsay01 and Facebook https://www.facebook.com/Gordonramsay01
